PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-06842021-07-01
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of ANDRÉ HUDON of Notre-Dame-de-l'Île-Perrot, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
